name: Turbo Racing
description:
Turbo Racing is an arcade motorsport drift racing game filled with driving fun and a healthy competitive spirit. Take part in racing races and show what you are capable of! Pass the tracks with the help of drift and use all your skills to overtake rivals and come to the finish line first! Choose from 12 different racing cars and hit the road!



★★★ Features ★★★
- Colorful graphics.
- Multiple game modes
- Great soundtrack
- 12 racing cars
- drift



Welcome to the world of Turbo Racing!
